To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private TripleExponentialMovingAverage _tema;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_tema = TEMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_tema.IsReady)
{
    var current = _tema.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.tema = self.TEMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.tema.IsReady:
    current = self.tema.Current.Value
